§ 300mm–2. Education and outreach The WTC Program Administrator shall institute a program that provides education and outreach on the existence and availability of services under the WTC Program. The outreach and education program—(1) shall include—(A) the establishment of a public Web site with information about the WTC Program;
(B) meetings with potentially eligible populations;
(C) development and dissemination of outreach materials informing people about the program; and
(D) the establishment of phone information services; and
(2) shall be conducted in a manner intended—(A) to reach all affected populations; and
(B) to include materials for culturally and linguistically diverse populations.
